constraints.name: adjacent_difference
constraints.description: 节点只能移动到与其相邻的节点（共享边的节点）
constraints.formal: For a node (i, j), it can only move to (i-1, j), (i+1, j), (i, j-1), or (i, j+1) if the destination is within the grid.

constraints.name: distinct_operation_types_constraint
constraints.description: 访问某个节点需要具备该节点对应的特定标记
constraints.formal: To visit node (i, j), the vehicle must have stamp M_{i,j}.

constraints.name: graph_connectivity
constraints.description: 必须存在一条从起点到终点的路径，且路径上的每个节点都满足标记要求
constraints.formal: There exists a path from (r_h, c_h) to (r_w, c_w) such that for every node (i, j) on the path, the vehicle has stamp M_{i,j}.

result.description: 求两点间最小路径代价

result.name: optimal_substructure
result.description: 最优子结构：从起点到终点的最短路径可以通过子路径的最优解组合而成，满足无后效性
